title: Ornament, Christmas, 1850–99
creditline: Gift of Mary M. Kenway from the estate of Sarah B. Russell
description: Pedestal with a white dove on a metal spring.  Tail and one part of wing missing.

tombstone.epitaph:
Ornament, Christmas, 1850–99.
1850–99. White sugar. Gift of Mary M. Kenway from the estate of Sarah B. Russell. 1956-32-46.
